item.title: By: Benjamin Dell
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Dell
item.description:
Hey, thanks for featuring us. Happy to answer any questions, if there are any.
Most importantly, we'd love to know what the wider design community thinks of Updatey (both from a design standpoint, as well as a tool to use with your clients to help increase transparency and engagement once a project has kicked off :)
Thanks again,
Ben Founder & CEO, Updatey
item.content:encoded:
Hey, thanks for featuring us. Happy to answer any questions, if there are any.

Most importantly, we’d love to know what the wider design community thinks of Updatey (both from a design standpoint, as well as a tool to use with your clients to help increase transparency and engagement once a project has kicked off

Thanks again,

Ben
Founder & CEO, Updatey
